name: The 5th Asia-Pacific Social Science Conference
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), Asia-Pacific Social Science Conference (APSSC) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of business, communication, economics, education, finance, management, politics, psychology, society and more. 2017 APSSC will take place from November 6-8, 2017 in Fukuoka, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals.
